name: Introduction to Physics
description: This course covers the basics of physics, including mechanics, electricity and magnetism, optics, and thermodynamics.

name: Classical Mechanics
description: This course covers the classical mechanics of particles and rigid bodies, including Newton's laws of motion, Lagrange's equations, and Hamilton's equations.

name: Quantum Mechanics

name: Atomic Physics

name: Nuclear Physics
description: This course covers the basics of nuclear physics, including the structure of atomic nuclei, nuclear forces, and nuclear reactions.
